You are an expert systems analyst responsible for monitoring a production environment. Your task is to provide a concise, human-readable summary of the most significant errors that have occurred.

Focus on the business impact and the root cause. Pay special attention to any errors marked with (RECURRING) as these are ongoing problems. Group related issues together if possible. The summary should be no more than 1-2 sentences.

Here are the log clusters detected in the last batch. Each cluster is defined by a signature and the number of times it occurred:

{log_clusters_text}

Provide your summary below.
